description.value: These blades come in a variety of shapes and styles, but they are typically 2 feet long.

Activate A Strike

This flask filled with corrosive acid deals 1 acid damage, 3d6 persistent acid damage, and 3 acid splash damage. You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls.

Activate A Strike

Alchemist's fire is a combination of volatile liquids that ignite when exposed to air. Alchemist's fire deals 3d8 fire damage, 3 persistent fire damage, and 3 fire splash damage. You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls.

Activate A Strike

Bottled lightning is packed with volatile reagents that create a blast of electricity when they are exposed to air. Bottled lightning deals 3d6 electricity damage and 3 electricity splash damage. On a hit, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] until the start of your next turn. You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls.

Activate 1 Strike

The liquid reagents in this vial rapidly absorb heat when exposed to air. A frost vial deals the listed cold damage and cold splash damage. On a hit, the target takes a status penalty to its Speeds until the end of its next turn. Many types of frost vial also grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls, the bomb deals 3d6 cold damage and 3 cold splash damage, and the target takes a -10-foot penalty.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Frost Vial (Greater)]

Adventurers who don't wear armor travel in durable clothing. Though it's not armor and uses your unarmored defense proficiency, it still has a Dex Cap and can grant an item bonus to AC if etched with potency runes.

A mix of digestive juices and green dragon poison glands nauseates the victim as its flesh is digested from within.

Activate A Interact (Contact)

Saving Throw DC 37 Fortitude

Onset 1 minute

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[6d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[7d6[poison]] damage and sickened 3 (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[9d6[poison]] damage and sickened 4 (1 round)

This tacky, hardened sap is harvested from trees infected by fungal blights and exposed to open flames.

Activate A Interact (Contact)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34]

Onset 1 minute

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[8d6[poison]] damage (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[10d6[poison]] damage (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[15d6[poison]] damage (1 round)

The toxic deathcap mushroom can be dried, ground, and treated to form a flavorless powder with accelerated effects.

Activate A Interact (Ingested)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34]

Onset 10 minutes

Maximum Duration 6 minutes

Stage 1 @Damage[13d6[poison]] damage (1 minute)

Stage 2 @Damage[17d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2} (1 minute)

Stage 3 @Damage[20d6[poison]] damage and sickened 3 (1 minute)

Activate A Interact

Elixirs of life accelerate a living creature''s natural healing processes and immune system. Upon drinking this elixir, you regain [[/r (7d6+18)[healing]]]{7d6+18 Hit Points} and gain +2 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Elixir of Life (Greater)]

Malyass root paste sees use to impede opponents in athletic competitions, in addition to espionage and tracking.

Activate 3 Interact (Contact)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34]

Onset 1 minute

Maximum Duration 6 minutes

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} and -10-foot status penalty to all Speeds (1 minute)

Stage 2 clumsy 2 and -20-foot status penalty to all Speeds (1 minute)

Stage 3 clumsy 3, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard], and -30-foot status penalty to all Speeds

Venom from enormous purple worms leaves a victim weakened.

Activate 2 Interact (Injury)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[5d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[6d6[poison]] damage and enfeebled 2 (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[8d6[poison]] damage and enfeebled 2 (1 round)

Distilled from the Plane of Shadow, this oily substance imposes tenebrous effects. The enfeebled condition from shadow essence lasts for 24 hours.

Activate 2 Interact (Injury)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[3d6[void]] damage and @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[3d6[void]] damage, @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1} (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[3d6[void]] damage, @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage, and enfeebled 2 (1 round)

A paste made by mashing the fine, threadlike roots of a certain creeper vine, spider root renders a victim clumsy and maladroit.

Activate A Interact (Contact)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34]

Onset 1 minute

Maximum Duration 6 minutes

Stage 1 @Damage[8d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} (1 minute)

Stage 2 @Damage[9d6[poison]] damage and clumsy 2 (1 minute)

Stage 3 @Damage[10d6[poison]] damage and clumsy 3 (1 minute)

Blue Viper carries the following infused items: 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Acid Flask (Greater)], 4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Alchemist's Fire (Greater)], 6 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Blightburn Resin], 4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Bottled Lightning (Greater)], 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Deathcap Powder], 4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Elixir of Life (Greater)], 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Frost Vial (Greater)], 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Malyass Root Paste], 9 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Purple Worm Venom], 6 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Shadow Essence], and 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Spider Root]. These items last for 24 hours, or until the next time Blue Viper makes his daily preparations.

Trigger A creature adjacent to Blue Viper hits him with a melee unarmed Strike.

Effect The triggering creature is exposed to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Dragon Bile]. This consumes the poison, and Blue Viper can't use Poisoned Coat again until he spends 10 minutes applying one dose of contact or injury poison to his clothing.

When Blue Viper successfully Strikes an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] creature with a poisoned weapon or exposes an off-guard creature to an inhaled poison, the creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to its initial save against that poison.

Requirements Blue Viper is holding a contact or injury poison.

Effect Blue Viper swigs the poison and sprays it out of his mouth, affecting a @Template[type:cone|distance:15]. Blue Viper isn't exposed to the poison. All creatures in the cone are immediately exposed to the poison and each creature must attempt a Fortitude save against the poison.
Blue Viper's infused poisons have a DC of 34.
Blue Viper Interacts to draw an injury poison and applies it to a weapon he is holding.
